data.title: Baue Funeral Homes
data.meta_description: Baue Funeral Home provides funeral services in St. Charles, MO including cremation and burial. Call us today for pre-planning or custom planning options.
data.text:
We invite you to discover who has made Baue Funeral Homes the ultimate provider of creating healing experiences in the community. This section contains the heritage, vision, and people behind Baue Funeral Homes's reputation of quality, sincerity, and trust.

At Baue, we believe that every life is unique. That’s why we provide the widest range of options to ensure a life lived is honored and celebrated in a special way. Since 1935, we have provided funeral, cremation, burial and pre-planning services to the greater Saint Charles, Missouri communities including St. Louis, St. Peters, O’Fallon and all of Saint Charles County.

We go above and beyond to care for your family and build a beautiful, memorable, perfectly tailored tribute. Let us help you build your legacy today.

At Baue, we believe that every life is unique. That’s why we provide the widest range of options to ensure a life lived is honored and celebrated in a special way. Since 1935, we have provided funeral, cremation, burial and pre-planning services to the greater Saint Charles, Missouri communities including St. Louis, St. Peters, O’Fallon and all of Saint Charles County.
